title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 10 categories on the x axis representing Platform, and Share of respondents in each Platform on the y axis.
The highest category is found at Facebook where Share of respondents is 83.0.
The lowest category is found at Tumblr where Share of respondents is 2.0.
The highest value at Facebook is almost 41.5 times larger than the minimum value of Tumblr.
The highest value at Facebook is almost 41.5 times larger than the minimum value of Tumblr.
The difference between the max Platform Facebook and min Platform Tumblr is 81.0.
